review: I love this fire TV stick this is an amazing tool in place of DISH Network and DirecTV you have a lot of options with this to the point I'm giving one of these to my grandson for college he doesn't have to worry about paying a cable bill forget what he wants thank you I love this piece of instrument
author: elayne castleberry

review: Easy to install, easy to use, love it!
author: Kate Gipson

review: So Far I have had a good experience with the Fire Stick.  Once in a while it will have to "catch up" with the internet, I don't know if that is normal or not.
author: Judy England

review: only work for one day first day I had it worked great next day then work anymore no customer service phone number to call anybody very disappointed
author: lance harris
